== Halgeri (603665) ==
      
Halgeri is a village in the [[Siddapur ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 423.79 hectares and harbouring 197 households with total population of 742 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[SIDDAPUR]] is at a distance of 11 km. Male population is 356 and female population is 386. Scheduled Caste Population is 85 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 603665<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
